A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I don't understand all the bad press for this movie. It's true that this was not a typical Star Wars movie. Why is that such a big deal? The prequels were typical Star Wars movies\, and look how that turned out. This movie had everything a good Star Wars movie should have. Space battles\, force powers\, lightsabers\, and the Millennium Falcon. What else is there?
